+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/status_textview"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/operand_textview_margin"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/operand_textview_margin"
+        android:gravity="end"
+        android:text=""
+        android:textSize="@dimen/status_textview_text_size"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/operand_textview"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="1.0" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/operand_textview"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/operand_textview_margin"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/operand_textview_margin"
+        android:gravity="end"
+        android:text="@string/_operand_placeholder"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/operand_textview_text_size"
+        android:textStyle="bold"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/grid_container"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="1.0" />
+
+    <GridLayout
+        android:id="@+id/grid_container"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:columnCount="4"
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_clear_all"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:layout_column="1"
+            android:text="@string/_clear_all"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_clear_operand"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_clear_operand"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_division"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_division"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_7"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_7"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_8"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_8"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_9"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_9"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_multiply"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_multiply"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_4"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_4"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_5"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_5"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_6"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_6"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_substract"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_decrement"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_1"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_1"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_2"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_2"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_3"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_3"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_add"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_increment"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_0"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_columnSpan="2"
+            android:layout_gravity="fill"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_0"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_dot"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_dot"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/button_equals"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="@dimen/button_margin"
+            android:text="@string/_equals"
+            android:textStyle="bold"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/button_text_size" />
+    </GridLayout>
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,4 +1,8 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <resources>
-    <dimen name="button_text">40sp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="button_text_size">24sp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="button_margin">2dp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="operand_textview_margin">22dp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="operand_textview_text_size">36sp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="status_textview_text_size">24sp</dimen>
 </resources>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -12,9 +12,13 @@
     <string name="_0">0</string>
     <string name="_percent">%</string>
     <string name="_division">/</string>
+    <string name="_sign_switch">+/-</string>
+    <string name="_clear_all">c</string>
+    <string name="_clear_operand">ce</string>
     <string name="_multiply">*</string>
     <string name="_increment">+</string>
     <string name="_decrement">-</string>
     <string name="_dot">,</string>
     <string name="_equals">=</string>
+    <string name="_operand_placeholder">0</string>
 </resources>
